property.name: pageName
property.label: Component Name
property.description: Unique string used to identify the list view component and its corresponding user configuration. Names should NEVER be changed.

property.name: mode
property.datasource: App Page,Single List View,Single Object List View,Related List View,Split View
property.label: Component Mode
property.description: Indicates the mode the component should be displayed in.

property.name: singleListViewObject
property.label: Single List View Object
property.description: The parent list view object displayed if displaying the component in SINGLE or RELATED list view mode.

property.name: singleListViewApiName
property.label: Single List View API Name
property.description: The API name of the list view to use if displaying the component in SINGLE or RELATED list view mode.

property.name: mainTitle
property.label: Title
property.description: String used if the title is displayed. Names should be distinct within a lightning page.

property.name: hasMainTitle
property.label: Display Title
property.description: Indicates whether the name should be displayed or not.

property.name: displayActions
property.label: Display Actions
property.description: Indicates whether the actions dropdown should be displayed.

property.name: allowAdmin
property.label: Display Admin Button
property.description: Indicates whether the admin button should be displayed.

property.name: displayTextSearch
property.label: Display Text Search
property.description: Indicates whether text search of the returned data should be available.

property.name: displayReprocess
property.label: Display List View Reprocessing Button
property.description: Indicates whether the list view reprocessing button should be displayed.

property.name: displayURL
property.label: Display Original List View Button
property.description: Indicates whether to display the button which links to the original related Salesforce list view.

property.name: displayRowCount
property.label: Display Row Count
property.description: Indicates whether the row count should be displayed.

property.name: displaySelectedCount
property.label: Display Selected Count
property.description: Indicates whether the selected row count should be displayed.

property.name: displayModified
property.label: Display Modified Details
property.description: Indicates whether the last modified date and user should be displayed.

property.name: displayExportButton
property.label: Allow Data Export
property.description: Indicates whether the list view data should be made available for download as a CSV file.

property.name: typeAheadListSearch
property.label: Use Type-Ahead For List View Search
property.description: Indicates whether type-ahead searching functionality should be used when selecting list views. This is useful if your org has a larger number of list views than can be displayed ordinarily.

property.name: typeAheadObjectSearch
property.label: Use Type-Ahead For Object Search
property.description: Indicates whether type-ahead searching functionality should be used when selecting the object of the list view. This is useful if your org has a large number of objects that are displayed.

property.name: displayRecordPopovers
property.label: Display Record Popovers
property.description: Indicates whether the record detail popover should be displayed when the user moves the mouse over the record URL or name.

property.name: excludedRecordPopoverTypes
property.label: Excluded Record Popover Types
property.description: Indicates those object types for which record detail popovers should not be displayed when the user moves the mouse over the record URL or name.

property.name: allowRefresh
property.label: Allow Automatic Data Refresh
property.description: Indicates whether the data refresh checkbox should be made available. This checkbox allows the user to automatically have the page data refreshed. Use with caution!

property.name: allowInlineEditing
property.label: Allow Inline Editing
property.description: Indicates whether inline editing should be allowed for the list view rows.

property.name: includedObjects
property.label: Included Objects
property.description: A comma delimited list of API object names that are to be included on the page. If blank, all objects are included.

property.name: excludedObjects
property.label: Excluded Objects
property.description: A comma delimited list of API object names that are to be excluded from the page. If blank, no objects are excluded.

property.name: joinFieldName
property.label: Joined Field Name
property.description: The API field name of the field that should be used by this component if it receives ids from another component. If blank, no joining takes place.

property.name: useMessageChannel
property.label: Use Message Channel
property.description: Indicates whether the component should send messages when records are selected. This value only needs to be false in situations where many list view components are on the same page. If unsure....set to true!

property.name: joinCriteria
property.label: Join Criteria Data
property.description: Only used for LWC development. Holds the external Id criteria used to filter the list view. (comma delimited)

property.name: singleListViewObject2
property.label: Single List View Object (Large Orgs)
property.description: The list view object to use if displaying the component in SINGLE list view mode. Use this value in large orgs where the other single list view object field does not get populated.

property.name: singleListViewApiName2
property.label: Single List View API Name (Large Orgs)
property.description: The standard list view API name to use if displaying the component in SINGLE list view mode. Use this value in large orgs where the other single list view object field does not get populated.
